TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk- in interview for Lab Technician Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 12:37 IST
 Tata Memorial Centre
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 25,510 to 32,000




FOLLOW

The Tata Memorial Hospital (TMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Lab Technician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc., M.Sc., and DMLT can apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Lab Technician	01	DMLT, B.Sc., M.Sc.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Age limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,510/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 32,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the TMC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Carry all the required documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

H.R.D. Department, Outsourcing Cell, 4th floor, Service Block Building, Tata Memorial Hospital, Dr. E. Borges Road, Parel, Mumbai - 400012.

Important Dates:

Starting date	22-08-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025

Eligible applicants can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the application deadline. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc., M.Sc., and DMLT may apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the Direct interview.
